ome.smuggler.config

Class BaseConfigDir

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.object.AbstractWrapper<T>
      • util.object.Wrapper<java.nio.file.Path>
        • ome.smuggler.config.BaseDir
          • ome.smuggler.config.BaseConfigDir
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Supplier<java.nio.file.Path>

    public class BaseConfigDir
extends BaseDir
    The base directory where to look for configuration files. This path can be specified in the system properties at start up or as an environment variable. System properties take precedence over environment variables. If the path is not found in either places, it will default to the current working directory of the Smuggler's process.
    See Also:
    PriorityConfigProvider

      BaseConfigDir()
      Creates a new instance to read the directory value from the system properties or environment, defaulting to the current working directory if no value is found.
